      • save

        public void save(int userId,
                 Stock stock,
                 boolean buy,
                 int num)
        Create a new transaction record in the transaction table
        Parameters:
        userId - Id of the user who made the transaction
        stock - The stock involved in the transaction
        buy - Boolean value indicating whether a stock was bought or sold
        num - Number of shares involved in the transaction
